values.help: 0=The motor goes clockwise when unlatched; 1= The motor goes counterclockwise when unlatched
values.label: Invert Lock Direction

values.help: Motor/relay run time LOCK in sec 1-15
values.label: Run time Lock

values.help: Motor/relay run time UNLOCK in sec 1-15
values.label: Run time UnLock

values.help: How the motor will turn according to torque and speed
values.label: Step Motor drive mode

items.label: (Step motor) Wave drive mode.(Less torque, min. power usage, full rotation speed.)
(Step motor) Full drive mode.  (Medium torque, max. power usage, full rotation speed.)
(Step motor) HalfFstep drive mode. (Max. torque, max. power usage, half rotation speed.)

(Relay) Puts DC on connector pin 1 & 2 for the duration of parameter #2 or #3. The polarity of pin 1 & 2 are reversed with respect to  open / close command. A close command would set p1+ and p2F, open is p1F and   p2+
(Relay) Lock open sets p1+, p2F, p3z, p4z for parameter #3 seconds. Lock close sets p1z, p2z, p3+, p4F.
